channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: High-Tech ‘Bubble Wrap’ Lets You Hold Fire Without Getting Burned
item.description: Once applied to building windows, the thin insulator could save houses a lot of energy in the future.

item.title: Comment vos mots de passe, même sécurisés, en disent beaucoup sur vous [Sponso]
item.description: Est-ce que vous vous souvenez comment vous avez créé vos mots de passe ? Sur quelles bases conscientes ou inconscientes l'avez-vous façonné ? On vous explique ce qu'un mot de passe dit de vous, et les implications en matière de protection de la vie privée que cela comporte.

item.title: In 2025, tech giants decided smart glasses are the next big thing
item.description: There's a growing sentiment that gadgets have gotten boring. And while I don't fully agree, I understand why people might feel that way. Just think about some of the novel device types that companies have tried to push since the original iPhone came out. 3D TVs were a massive flop and tablets still feel like extra-large smartphones despite Apple's efforts to prop them up as laptop replacements. Meanwhile, even with huge technological advancements over the last decade, VR headsets remain relatively niche due to factors like high prices and a lack of compelling content. And although big names li...

item.title: Netflix responds to concerns about WBD deal
item.description: Industry concerns over Netflix acquiring Warner Bros has led executives to address fears regarding jobs and theatrical releases.

item.title: Facebook Messenger’s desktop app is no more
item.description: The app remains usable via the web, Facebook app, and through the mobile app for iOS and Android.

item.title: Vous nous avez alertés, Free a-t-il menti sur le tarif bloqué de la Freebox Pop S ?
item.description: Un lecteur nous informe que la Freebox Pop S aurait vu son prix augmenter, rompant avec la promesse de Free de maintenir un prix pendant 5 ans.

item.title: Google Maps dans Gemini ne fonctionne plus comme avant
item.description: Chercher un restaurant, un café ou un lieu dans Gemini ne donne plus du tout la même réponse.

item.title: GNOME bans AI-generated extensions
item.description: Earlier this month, the GNOME Shell Extensions store updated its review guidelines to include a new section specifically stating that "extensions must not be AI-generated," as reported by It's FOSS and Phoronix. Developers producing add-ons for the Linux desktop environment can still use AI as a tool, but if their extension's code contains signs of […]...

item.title: Enceintes sono 2025 : la sélection des meilleures enceintes de soirées
item.description: Pour écouter votre musique à fond au bord de la piscine ou même organiser un karaoké en extérieur, le tout sans se prendre la tête, l'enceinte de soirée est l'appareil idéal. Nous avons sélectionné pour vous les meilleures enceintes sono Bluetooth de soirée.

item.title: New Clue Emerges From Botched Scandinavian Raid: A 2,300-Year-Old Fingerprint
item.description: In the fourth century BCE, mysterious raiders attacked a Danish island. Now we might finally know where they came from.

item.title: Merriam-Webster’s 2025 word of the year is ‘slop’
item.description: Merriam-Webster has settled on a word that represents 2025 - and that word is "slop." The dictionary-maker defines "slop" as "digital content of low quality that is produced usually in quantity by means of artificial intelligence," something that many people have become familiar with as AI-generated content permeates the internet. This year, some of the […]...

item.title: The Meta Quest 3S is $50 off and is bundled with a $50 gift card and game
item.description: If you’re looking for a last-minute gift for a gamer, you’re in luck. Both Best Buy and Target are offering the 128GB Meta Quest 3S VR headset for around $249 ($50 off) and include a $50 gift card on top of that. Best Buy has bundled the headset with a copy of The Walking Dead: […]

item.title: The 8 Biggest Takeaways From That Gruesome, Euphoric ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Finale
item.description: Pennywise was always going to slither away for another 27-year slumber, but boy did he wave good-bye with gusto.

item.title: The 11 best gifts under $25 for 2025
item.description: So you want to give someone a gift but you don’t have a ton of cash to spare. Don’t fret because first, you’re not alone, and second, there are tons of options to choose from. Especially if you’re looking in the tech space, it can feel especially daunting to find a gadget that’s affordable but also worth gifting — in other words, not a piece of junk that will eventually take up residence at the bottom of a drawer. But you don’t have to drain your wallet to get someone a cool gadget that will both be useful and make their lives easier. We’ve collected our favorite pieces of tech under $25 that ...

item.title: Kindle a trouvé la meilleure idée pour se rappeler de tous les personnages de Game of Thrones
item.description: Amazon poursuit son virage vers l’intelligence artificielle. Après Prime Video, c’est au tour de l’application Kindle d’adopter les modèles de langage. Sa nouvelle fonctionnalité, « Ask this book », permet aux lecteurs de dialoguer directement avec leurs ouvrages numériques pour poser des questions sur l’intrigue ou les personnages, sans risquer de spoilers. Déjà testée sur iOS aux États‑Unis, elle annonce une nouvelle ère interactive pour la lecture, non sans soulever quelques enjeux de confidentialité et de droits d’auteur....

item.title: Denmark wants to ban VPNs to unlock foreign, illegal streams – and experts are worried
item.description: Denmark has drafted a new law to stop people from using VPNs to access foreign streaming libraries and illegal websites. But digital rights advocates are sounding the alarm.

item.title: Les 10 smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid : OnePlus, Nothing, Samsung et Xiaomi mettent Android à l’honneur
item.description: Pour notre top 10 des smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid, certaines marques prennent le dessus. Au programme de ce top, plusieurs constructeurs de smartphones Android avec leurs visions de téléphones.

item.title: Swallowing the Moon and other new indie games worth checking out
item.description: Welcome to our latest roundup of what's going on in the indie game space. Between The Game Awards and showcases like Day of the Devs, Wholesome Snack, Latin American Games and Women-Led Games, there’s been a ton of video game news over the last week (I need Control Resonant ASAP, please and thank you, Remedy). And hey, guess what? I've got even more for you to dig into, including info on some new releases that you can play right now.One of those is a game I’d been looking forward to since about 2022, and it’s always nice when something you’ve remained patient for turns out to be worth the wait...

item.title: Spotify was down this morning for thousands of users: Updates on the widespread outages
item.description: My boyfriend texted me those dreaded four words: "Is your Spotify down?" Sure enough his, mine and thousands of other users' Spotify accounts appear to be down and out at the moment, with Downdetector recording over 10,000 reports from users. Spotify is apparently working on the problem. The account, Spotify Status, shared an update on X at 9:45 AM on Monday, "We’re aware of some issues right now and are checking them out!" About an hour later, the company shared an update saying that the outage was resolved as of 10:34 AM ET. All clear! Thanks for your patience. If you're still having issues,...

item.title: Xiaomi Watch 2 Pro : cette montre complète sous Wear OS est désormais à moitié prix
item.description: Dévoilée en 2023, la Xiaomi Watch 2 Pro est la première montre du fabricant à tourner sous Wear OS. Elle a tout d'une montre haut de gamme, et pourtant, elle coûte seulement 134 euros chez Électro Dépôt, au lieu de 269,99 euros.

item.title: History lessons for better public policy: how to build a cyber secure society
item.description: Exploring strategies and innovations shaping safer, more resilient digital communities worldwide.

item.title: Stack Overflow users don’t trust AI. They’re using it anyway
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Prashanth Chandrasekar, who is the CEO of Stack Overflow. I last had Prashanth on the show in 2022, one month before ChatGPT launched. While the generative AI boom had tons of impact on all sorts of companies, it immediately upended everything about Stack Overflow in an existential way. Stack Overflow, if […]

item.title: Forfaits B&YOU : voici les offres mobile et internet de la filiale low cost de Bouygues Telecom
item.description: B&YOU représente la marque low cost et sans engagement de Bouygues Télécom. À l'instar de Sosh et de RED by SFR, on y trouve des forfaits mobiles ainsi qu'une offre internet unique, et cette dernière surclasse aisément la concurrence. Mais globalement, voyons voir ce que vaut B&YOU en 2025.

item.title: New Stranger Things trailer hints at what's next for our heroes
item.description: Warning: the following contains spoilers for part one of Stranger Things season fiveWith just over a week to go until Netflix releases the next batch of Stranger Things episodes, the company has dropped a trailer for the second part of season five. The clip begins in the aftermath of the action-packed ending to the first bunch of episodes, with bodies and blazes surrounding Will as he says in a voiceover, "We failed. We never stood a chance." However, his mother Joyce tells him that, "This is not over. Not by a long shot." We learn in this trailer that some of the gang who were still in the Up...

item.title: La Volkswagen Polo électrique se dévoile un peu plus : un coffre XXL et des autonomies supérieures à la R5
item.description: Face à la concurrence, notamment française, sur le marché des voitures électriques abordables, Volkswagen contre-attaque avec l'ID. Polo, un modèle annoncé à moins de 25 000 euros. Cette nouvelle venue peut-elle inquiéter les Renault 5 E-Tech et autres Peugeot e-208 ?

item.title: Tesla starts testing robotaxis in Austin with no safety driver
item.description: It's one of the last big steps before the company can truly claim it's operating a robotaxi service, and start to take on Waymo.

item.title: Microsoft will expand bug bounties - even on programs without official payouts
item.description: Any dodgy code affecting Microsoft's products and services will now be covered under the 'In Scope by Default' bug bounty program.

item.title: Snapchat rolls out its end-of-year Recaps
item.description: The Recap is a short video that offers a personalized look at highlights from Snaps, Stories, and Chats, showing how users connected and expressed themselves throughout the year.

item.title: Your email app isn't the weak link but your cloud configuration probably is
item.description: If you’re blaming email for breaches, you’re missing the misconfigurations attackers actually exploit.

item.title: Comment quitter un groupe WhatsApp sans se faire remarquer
item.description: Meta fait évoluer la gestion des groupes sur WhatsApp. La messagerie instantanée permettra aux membres de quitter un groupe sans en informer la totalité des membres.

item.title: La pénurie de mémoire RAM pourrait durer bien plus longtemps que prévu selon ce fabricant
item.description: Alors que les consommateurs font face à une flambée du prix des barrettes de mémoire RAM, l'un des principaux fabricants prévoit que la pénurie va traîner en longueur.

item.title: Smartphones Xiaomi : c’est quoi ce nouveau mode réparation dans HyperOS 3 ?
item.description: Le système d’exploitation HyperOS 3 introduit sur les smartphones Xiaomi un « mode réparation » qui promet de protéger vos données lorsque votre téléphone doit être manipulé par un professionnel.

item.title: Blink and you'll miss it - the Galaxy S25 Ultra has just hit a new record-low price ahead of Christmas
item.description: The stunning Galaxy S25 Ultra is currently listed for its lowest ever price at Amazon - a real Christmas treat.

item.title: How the New ‘Tomb Raider’ Games Want to Unite Lara’s Past and Future
item.description: What's next for Lara Croft? Not just a new show, but also a pair of 'Tomb Raider' games that look back and forward on the franchise.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Tuesday, December 16 (game #1422)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Tuesday, December 16 (game #919)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Tuesday, December 16 (game #653)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Google smashes language barriers with live translation for any earbuds on Android — here’s how it works
item.description: You no longer have to use Pixel Buds to take advantage of live translations in Google Translate - now all earbuds are compatible.

item.title: On a frôlé la catastrophe : une collision monumentale entre un satellite chinois et Starlink a été esquivée de justesse !
item.description: Deux satellites ont failli entrer en collision à 560 kilomètres au-dessus de nos têtes. L'accident, évité de justesse, aurait été provoqué par un simple manque de communication entre les différents responsables.

item.title: La mythique Smart Fortwo électrique est de retour : voici tout ce qu’on sait sur la future Smart #2
item.description: Après des années d'absence dans le segment des mini-citadines, Smart s'apprête à raviver la flamme de son modèle le plus emblématique. La future #2, héritière directe de la mythique Fortwo, a été annoncée. Mais depuis la fin de la Fortwo que nous connaissions, les choses ont bien changé chez Smart.

item.title: I tested a 5K monitor that’s over $1,000 less than Apple’s Studio Display: It’s good enough
item.description: Most people know at least two things about 5K monitors: they look great, and they're usually expensive. The Apple Studio Display is the most popular model, and it costs $1,599. But I've been testing one that's similar in some important ways and costs just $355 (!?) at its cheapest-ever price. Unsurprisingly, at a fraction of […]

item.title: Boulanger retire 100 € sur ce pack Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G + enceinte Bluetooth pour Noël
item.description: Avec Noël qui approche, Boulanger n'hésite pas à proposer des produits Tech populaires dans des packs à prix cassés. C'est le cas par exemple du Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G (256 Go) proposé avec une enceinte Bluetooth, pour 299 euros contre 399 euros habituellement.

item.title: Worried about internet connectivity during your holiday? Have your data secured with Ubigi eSIM
item.description: Global coverage, fast 5G speeds, and flexible data plans for travelers and remote workers.

item.title: First Voyage raises $2.5M for its AI companion helps you build habits
item.description: First Voyage has raised $2.5 million in a seed funding round from a16z speed run, SignalFire, True Global, and other investors.

item.title: New users can get half off one of our favorite budgeting apps right now
item.description:
If you have a resolution in the new year to get more acquainted with your finances, a good budgeting app can help with that. One of our favorites is a bit cheaper to sign up for right now: Monarch Money is offering 50 percent off annual subscriptions for new users. Use the code MONARCHVIP at checkout to get half off, so you'll pay just $50 for one year of access.
Monarch Money was the runner-up in our guide to the best budgeting apps in 2025, and it was definitely a grower. Initially we found the experience of using the app to be needlessly complicated compared to some of its rivals, but get...

item.title: Stranger Things Season 5, Volume 2 trailer has me way too worried about Dustin and Steve
item.description: The trailer for "Stranger Things" Season 5, Volume 2 sees the entire Hawkins crew in mortal peril as Vecna takes control.

item.title: The Meta Quest 3S is back down to its Cyber Monday all-time low of $250
item.description:
The Meta Quest 3S is back on sale at its all-time low price of $250. That's $50 off, or a discount of 17 percent, and matches a deal we saw on Cyber Monday. The 3S is the more affordable model in the company's current VR headset lineup. It features the same Snapdragon XR2 processor as the more expensive Meta Quest 3, but with lower resolution per eye and a slightly narrower field of view.
In our hands-on review, we gave the Meta Quest 3S a score of 90, noting how impressive the tech was compared to its price. The headset was comfortable to wear during longer gaming periods, and the performa...
